attributes.action: The BBC is no longer an unbiased organisation, its management should be voted in by license payers
attributes.additional_details:
The coverage of the BBC has for a long time leaned to one political persuasion and ideology. It no longer represents a vast portion of the populace that are funding the organisation itself.

In order to rectify this, either the licensing fee should be optional, the BBC News service should be restricted or license payers should be able to vote in the board of the BBC.
